original_text: As for the oblation of the firstfruits, ye shall offer them unto the Lord: but they shall not be burnt on the altar for a sweet savour.
korean_text: 처음 익은 것으로는 그것을 여호와께 드릴지나 향기로운 냄새를 위하여는 제단에 올리지 말지며

sentences.original_text: As for the oblation of the firstfruits
ye shall offer them unto the Lord
but they shall not be burnt on the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그것들은 제단에서 불태워져서는 안 되며
